name: swift-wing
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases the target’s Speed effort by 1.

flavor_text.black_white: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.
